survey.title: Daily Assessment
survey.submitText: Thank you for finishing! This information will help you pay attention to important things in your recovery.

prompt.promptText: How would you rate your overall mood today?
How well did you sleep last night?
How much anger did you experience today?
How much conflict with others did you have today?
What situations happened today that you needed to try and cope with?
Overall, how well or poorly did you cope with things in the last 24 hours?
How well did you get things today that you needed to do?
In the last 24 hours, which of the following coping tools did you use?

property.label: Practice a formal relaxation or meditation method?
Deliberately face a situation that you have been avoiding?
Consciously talk to yourself as a way of coping?
Do some kind of positive activity to try and improve your mood?
Talk to somebody about a problem or seek support in some way?

prompt.promptText: How was the support you got from other(s)?

property.label: Made me feel a lot worse
Made me feel a little worse
Helped me feel a little better
Helped me feel a lot better

prompt.promptText: In the last 24 hours, did you do any of the following activities?

property.label: Do a homework task assigned by your treatment provider?

prompt.promptText: Did you take your doctor-prescribed medication(s) today?

property.label: No, my doctor has not prescribed any medications to me

prompt.promptText: Did you experience any side effects?
Did you drink alcohol in the last 24 hours?
How much did you drink? (One drink = 12oz of beer = one 6oz glass of wine = one 1.5oz shot of vodka or whiskey or gin)
Did you take any non-prescribed drug in the last 24 hours?

survey.title: PCL Assessment
survey.description: It is time to fill out your periodic assessment.
survey.submitText: Thank you for finishing! This information will help you pay attention to important things in your recovery.

prompt.displayLabel: Repeated Disturbing Memories, Thoughts, or Images
prompt.promptText: In the past month, how much have you been bothered by repeated disturbing memories, thoughts, or images of the stressful experience?
In the past month, how much have you been bothered by repeated disturbing dreams of the stressful experience?
In the past month, how much have you been bothered by suddenly acting or feeling as if the stressful experience were happening again (i.e. as if you were re-living it)?
In the past month, how much have you been bothered by feeling very upset when something reminded you of the stressful experience?
In the past month, how much have you been bothered by having physical reactions (e.g. heart pounding, trouble breathing, sweating) when something reminded you of the stressful experience?

prompt.displayLabel: Avoiding Thinking or Talking about Experience
prompt.promptText: In the past month, how much have you been bothered by avoiding thinking or talking about the stressful experience, or avoiding having feelings related to it?

prompt.displayLabel: Bothered by Avoiding Activities or Situations
prompt.promptText: In the past month, how much have you been bothered by avoiding activities or situations because they reminded you of the stressful experience?
In the past month, how much have you been bothered by trouble remembering important parts of the stressful experience?

prompt.displayLabel: Bothered by Loss of Interest in Activities
prompt.promptText: In the past month, how much have you been bothered by loss of interest in activities that you used to enjoy?
In the past month, how much have you been bothered by feeling distant or cut off from other people?
In the past month, how much have you been bothered by feeling emotionally numb or being unable to have loving feelings for those close to you?

prompt.displayLabel: Bothered by Feeling Future Will Be Cut Short
prompt.promptText: In the past month, how much have you been bothered by feeling as if your future somehow will be cut short?
In the past month, how much have you been bothered by trouble falling or staying asleep?
In the past month, how much have you been bothered by feeling irritable or having angry outbursts?
In the past month, how much have you been bothered by having difficulty concentrating?
In the past month, how much have you been bothered by being "superalert" or watchful or on guard?
In the past month, how much have you been bothered by feeling jumpy or easily startled?
